instruction: Analyse the following property restoration report and return a structured JSON summary following the schema below.

grade_definitions.1: Basic - Simple residential jobs with minimal complexity
grade_definitions.2: Intermediate - Standard commercial or complex residential work
grade_definitions.3: Advanced - Large-scale commercial, multi-discipline, or high-risk projects

schema.service_type: string (e.g., Water Damage, Mould Remediation, Fire & Smoke, Biohazard, Crime Scene)
schema.summary: string - concise executive summary of the report

sections.title: string - section heading (e.g., Assessment, Containment, Remediation)
sections.summary: string - brief summary of this section
keywords: string - key terms and technical vocabulary

detected_standards: string - IICRC standard codes mentioned or applicable

questions.category: string - category (e.g., Safety, Containment, Documentation, Equipment)
questions.question: string - specific question to verify compliance or quality
expected_evidence: string - what documentation or observations would answer this
questions.report_grade: integer (1–3) - complexity level this question applies to

instructions: Identify the primary service type (water damage, mould, fire, etc.)
Determine report complexity grade (1 = basic, 2 = intermediate, 3 = advanced)
Extract key sections and summarize each
List relevant IICRC standards referenced or applicable
Generate 5-10 verification questions based on the service type and grade
Return ONLY valid JSON matching the schema above - no markdown, no extra text
